resources.string: Music is an essential part of basketball. \nHoop Beats helps You to control beats off the court.

Hoop Beats Home. Its a main screen of the Hoop Beats App. It contains four activities(blocks). \nEach Buttos navigate to each Section of the App. Buttons sends explicit intents to Discover Section, Playlists, Now Playing and Radio.
Choose your favourite basketball \nteam, player or music artist
Search for a Team, Player or Artist

Hoop Beats Discover Section contains genre categories of selection. 
All three categories (Teams, Players, Artist) are build of a horizontal Scroll Views. 
They contain ImageView Gallery of each of genre. By clicking on first ImageView it should send an Implicit Intent to cloud library(SoundCloud) 
Libraries should be defined and filtered by specific algorhytm. Sort music by to artist, players and team. Notice!: As You Click First each Icon of Category, it sends intent to Now Playing Screen. 
 Discover Section also contains Search Window At the bootom. It should make possible to find content in soundCloud Libraries.

Playlist Section contains Three Blocks of recommended content. 
Each of them on specific routine/mood connected to basketball game. Each Button should send an intent to external soundcloud library. 
Fourth Button should allow to add yours new collection of Hoop Beats based on SoundCloud. 
Notice!:As u click on the button, it navigates You to Now Playing Section. Add New Beat Button generates a Toast message.

Now Playing Block contains ImageView and TextView of current playing song and artist. 
from soundcloud Library. It also contains Seek Bar which should show time progress of played song. 
There are Three ImageViews which should be responsible for Previous, Play(Pause), and Next Song Actions in Music Player. 
Each ImageView generates Toast Message of Action. 
At the Bottom of Screen We have Home Button which navigates you back to Hoop Beats Home Screen.

Radio Block should use SoundCloud Libraries to navigate u to 
Radio Podcasts connected to basketball topics. Its build of Horizontal ScrollView containing list of radio. 
It also should be able to use Action ImageViews like Play, Previous and Next. 
Using Home Button You can nagigate Yourself back to Hoop Beats Home Section.
